 Note:
 ~~~~~
 While half the Awakening content is MP maps, the other half is the new
 Zombies map, Der Eisendrache. This release enables Zombies mode in the game,
 and the maps Shadows of Evil, The Giant and Der Eisendrache are included.
 All updates & bonus content also included.
 
 --
 
 The latest installment of Zombies picks up where The Giant left off, as the
 Origins characters head to Der Eisendrache on a mission to stop the zombie
 apocalypse.

 1. Unrar.
 2. Burn or mount the image.
 3. Install the DLC to where you installed the main game.
 Required release: Call.of.Duty.Black.Ops.III-RELOADED 
 4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
 your game install directory.
 5. Play the game.
 6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
